Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by California in 1988...
Earned first career win on 4/8/1992...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1992, going 6-0, 1.69...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1992, going 21-10, 3.35 ERA...
Injured on 10/4/1993 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1994 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1995 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Pitcher in 1995...
